mapper.select: SELECT a.uuid as article_uuid, a.title, a.content, a.`status`, a.create_by, d.user_name, a.create_time, a.read_num, b.uuid AS voc_uuid, b.voc_code, b.`name` AS voc_type_name, count( c.article_uuid ) AS comment_num FROM article a INNER JOIN `user` d ON d.uuid = a.create_by LEFT JOIN voc b ON a.voc_type = b.uuid LEFT JOIN article_comment c ON a.uuid = c.article_uuid GROUP BY a.uuid
